description:
How to wire a plug, the year England won the World Cup and what the difference is between lager and ale and are among the 50 things every 'real' man needs to know, research reveals.怎样给插头接上电线？英格兰何时捧起大力神杯？拉格啤酒和麦芽啤酒有何区别？有研究发现，这些都包括在真汉子需要知道的50件事内。

A 'real' man should also know how to light a barbecue, what the scores were at the weekend - and recognise that when a woman says she is 'fine' it means she is not.真汉子还得知道如何给烧烤架点火以及周末的比分是多少，也得明白，当女人说她“我没事”时其实是有事。

The research, which was commissioned by William Hill, concluded a man should also know his wedding anniversary without having to pause to think.由威廉·希尔委托进行的这项研究结果表明，男人也得想都不用想就说出自己的结婚纪念日。

William Hill said: 'Having confidence balanced with an attentive nature and, of course, a bit of sporting knowledge, should set men up well when checking themselves against the list.'威廉·希尔说道：“在细心的本质和体育知识方面都有信心，会使男人在对照这个表单时感觉不错。”

 

TOP 50 THINGS EVERY 'REAL' MAN SHOULD KNOW真汉子应该知道的50件事

1. His wedding anniversary date结婚纪念日

2. Basic DIY基本的DIY技能

3. How to change a light bulb怎样换灯泡

4. How to tie up a tie怎样打领带

5. How to read a map怎样看地图

6. His partner’s favourite drink父母最爱的酒

7. How to iron a shirt怎样熨衬衫

8. How to change a tyre怎样换轮胎

9. How to wet shave correctly怎样正确刮胡子

10. The right amount of aftershave to use须后水的正确用量

11. How to change a fuse怎样换保险丝

12. When a woman says ‘I’m fine’ she is not fine当女人说“我没事”时其实是有事

13. How to put up a shelf怎样搭架子

14. How to polish his shoes怎样擦皮鞋

15. How to give a confident handshake怎样自信地握手

16. How many inches are in a foot脚的尺码

17. When to accept defeat and apologise何时认输、道歉

18. Know the offside rule知道什么是越位

19. The year England won the World Cup英格兰捧起大力神杯是哪一年

20. How to do his own laundry怎样清洗自己的衣物

21. How to fix a bike puncture怎样修好自行车爆了的轮胎

22. How to jumpstart a car怎样发动车子

23. How to parallel park怎样平行停车

24. The difference between ale and lager麦芽啤酒和拉格啤酒的区别

25. The best way to carve meat最好的切肉方式

26. His own height自己的身高

27. How to drive in snow怎样在下雪天驾驶

28. What wires represent earth, live and neutral火线、零线、地线分别是哪个

29. How to introduce himself怎样自我介绍

30. His parents’ address他父母家的地址

31. What the football scores were at the weekend周末球赛的比分

32. How to light a BBQ怎样给烧烤架点火

33. When a woman says ‘Do what you want’ do not do what you want当女人说“你想怎么样”是不要真的做想做的事

34. How to change oil怎样换机油

35. What the biggest recent football transfers are最近最大的足球转会是什么

36. How to build a fire怎样生火

37. Which way is north北边是哪边

38. How to use the contents of the toolbox怎样使用工具箱中的工具

39. How to tune in a telly怎样收看电视节目

40. How many miles are left after the petrol light appears油箱警示灯亮起后还能再开多少里程

41. How to fix a toilet怎样修马桶

42. How to put someone in a recovery position怎样把（受伤的）人放到有助于其苏醒的位置

43. His personal alcohol limits自己的酒量

44. Change a battery on a car给汽车换电池

45. How to get a car unstuck怎样把车从泥潭里拖出来

46. The words to the national anthem国歌的歌词

47. How to change a nappy怎样换尿布

48. How to perform CPR怎样做心肺复苏急救

49. How to put up a tent怎样搭帐篷

50. Who are favourites to win the Premier League哪个队有望英超夺冠

  • 面试中如何回答'你的期望薪资是多少'

  • 正能量集锦：6种想法让自信魅力四射
  • 囧研究 用选狗的方式来择偶

title: 好男人准则 真汉子要知道的50件事
